PerfectNetExp.abs: cozy 保暖罩dispirit 使沮丧giggle 哈哈地笑
dis- == 有时作di-,dispirit 使气馁，使沮丧divorce 离婚
...dispense 分配 dispel 驱散 dissipate 驱散，浪费dispirit 使气馁，使沮丧

list.abs: How dispirited he looks ! Perhaps he is ill ., 看他那无精打采的样子 , 可能是生病了吧.
we are thinking with our tired minds , broken hearts , and dispirited souls .我们正在以我们的疲累思想，坏掉的心和沮丧的灵魂想。
Our lack of progress is very dispiriting ., 我们毫无进展真使人气馁.
The heart dispirited and the mind indolent ., 心灰意懒.

sentences.sentence: "The bad state of her child's health demoralizes her"

auth_sentence.content: Such disputes dispirit those who want the church to look outward and upward, not nitpick over the past.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such disputes dispirit those who want the church to look outward and upward, not nitpick over the past.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such disputes dispirit those who want the church to look outward and upward, not nitpick over the past.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏
